attributes.action: Have an election now to clear up all this mess about expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You all need to clean your act up, we pay your wages at the end of the day and most of us dont like the micky taken out of us. I take home £270.00 per week and have to feed and clothe us all, and pay my bills from that.I cant claim for my rent, council tax, electric, gas, water, oh and my gardener!!! Something has gotta change NOW. Kind regards...........

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
